settings.content:
Eco-Friendly Corporate Gifts

Sustainable Corporate Gifting with BGB Biodegradable Golf Balls®

Looking for a unique and sustainable corporate gift? At BGB Biodegradable Golf Balls®, we offer custom-printed, eco-friendly golf balls that align with your company's values while making a lasting impression on clients, employees, and event attendees. Our biodegradable golf balls are designed to dissolve in water, making them perfect for corporate giveaways, golf tournaments, and promotional gifts—without harming the environment.

Two Ways to Customize Your Corporate Gift

We offer two popular options for corporate gifting:

settings.text:
For companies looking for a cost-effective and eco-conscious gift option, we provide bulk orders of our BGB Biodegradable Golf Balls® without packaging. Each ball is professionally printed with your company logo, ensuring a clean, branded look that reinforces your commitment to sustainability.

✅ Great for: Large-scale corporate events, trade shows, and branded giveaways
✅ Minimum Order: No MOQ
✅ Turnaround Time: 2-4 business days (rush orders available)

For a premium gifting experience, we offer custom logo printing on our BGB Biodegradable Golf Balls®, packed in our 3-ball sleeve with environmentally conscious packaging. This sleeve includes details about biodegradable golf balls and their environmental benefits, making it a thoughtful and informative gift.

✅ Great for: Executive gifts, high-end corporate giveaways, and sustainable golf events
✅ Includes: 3 custom-printed golf balls in our BGB Biodegradable Golf Balls® sleeve
✅ Turnaround Time: 2-4 business days (rush orders available)
